abort.already_configured: Carbon Offsetting integration is already configured

error.invalid_ipfs_creds: Invalid IPFS credentials. Either tick web3-auth or specify both auth and pwd
error.warnings: You should tick all points before using Carbon Offsetting Integration

data.warn_data_sending: The integration will send the coordinates of your home and energy consumption data (total kW*h consumed) to the remote server and use them to calculate the amount of carbon units to burn.

user.description: To use Carbon Offsetting Integration you should know the following:

data.ipfs_gw: IPFS gateway address in multiaddr format
data.is_ipfs_gw_w3: Whether specified IPFS gateway supports Web3 auth headers

conf.description: Add your Robonomics account seed phrases. You can also Specify remote IPFS gateway and whether it supports Web3 auth headers.
